amendment.description: Page 219, line 16, after the dollar amount, insert ``(decreased by $30,000,000)''. Page 226, line 1, after the dollar amount, insert ``(increased by $30,000,000)''. Page 226, line 8, after the dollar amount, insert ``(increased by $30,000,000)''.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Bergman amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Bergman.
